about_the_game:
FaceRig is now retired, new customers can check out



FaceRig Legrand Legacy DLC is free, for home use or with FaceRig Pro, and it contains seven 2D avatars.

Aria is an adventurous wanderer who’s chasing after the Beast of the Old World as foretold in an ancient prophecy.

A reigning champion of the arena in the corrupt city of Ostia, Azzam is a relentless fighter who is peerless in strength. His sharp wit and quiet demeanor suggest that he hasn’t always been a gladiator.

Eris is typically quiet and modest, but always excited to talk about the beautiful things she writes in her diary and hopes to see one day.

Finn’s adventure begins in Tel Harran, the City of Slavers. He can be overzealous in protecting his loved ones, but Finn often suspects his past is not as si

Geddo is believed to be one of the few remaining Norns – people who originate from the destroyed swampy forest of Finnias, in the South.

Full of himself, sarcastic, and deceitful. Kael is not exactly pleasant to have around. In spite of his confident exterior, however, Kael hides a painful past and an unusual physical condition.

Scatia is an adventurous wanderer who’s chasing after the Beast of the Old World as foretold in an ancient prophecy.

It requires the FaceRig Live2D Module DLC in order to work.
